joke: Chuck Norris once donated a pint of blood to a cancer patient. We know that cancer patient now as Superman.
the reason nobody can find bigfoot is because is because Chuck Norris found him first.
The band Disturbed used to be called I'm Fine until they saw Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris can curdle water just by looking at it.
Chuck Norris was asked if he's ever done any bareback riding? Chuck replied that every woman he's ever been with has given him a bare back ride.
